short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trading FOREX, CFDs on Shares, Indices, Gold & Petrol

long.am,ar,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
DF Mobile developed by DF Markets is a FREE high-performance trading application, allowing clients to trade Forex and over 1,100 CFD markets on the move. The flexible and easy-to-use interface makes the platform easy to use by beginners and pros alike. DFMobile has been specifically designed for the active trader, focussing on key features like execution, reliable pricing, accessibility and security.

Clients can use their existing accounts details to log in, or they can register for a new account.

Features:
- Flexible and easy-to-use interface
- Fast and accurate real-time charts and market data
- Wide variety of orders (market, limit, stop, OCO)
- Trade 77 FX pairs, Gold, Silver, and CFDs on shares, stock indices, and commodities
